name: LOLWARS B 1.0.1 Test Build 2A
description:
LOLWARS try it now!

I made a new update!

Try it now!

What`s new?

Added a new home! Don`t go to it is in development stage!

Added a temple!

A new mod called ''Creeper''

Added a treasure chest in the temple!

Extended gameplay!

In the next update i am going to add a new player mode that you can select after you finish it! And a hard mode! Stay tuned for more updates!
